alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alachua; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:22PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Alachua and west central Putnam Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 321 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking multiple strong thunderstorms over southeastern Alachua County and western Putnam county...moving slowly west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 45 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Interlachen, Hawthorne, Melrose Landing, Cross Creek, Hollister, Johnson, Mannville, Lochloosa and Grove Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
